# Sprite Shadow Off
<!--
@name: Sprite Shadow Off
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
Turns off one or all sprite shadows by setting the offsets to zero.
## Parameters

- **index**: Index of the sprite in the list of active sprites (optional)
